danger_zone

Class Lemmatization

  • java.lang.Object
    • danger_zone.Lemmatization

  • public class Lemmatization
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    2012-10-11 Class to find the stem or lemma of a word by using heuristics with suffixes and prefixes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> exceptions
      Exception mapping from an exception such as ran, to a word root like run
      private static java.lang.String[] prefixes
      List of common prefixes in the english language
      private static java.lang.String[] suffixes
      List of common suffixes in the english language
      (package private) java.lang.String word
      Variable to hold the initial word and once all operations have been applied, the lemma.
